There were no other sightings in Good Hope on or around November 26th 2000

divs: Sighting DetailsThis case file concerns an event that was witnessed by 5 members of the GeorgiaHaunt Hunt Team (GHHT) on 26Nov00. This group specializes in conductinginvestigations of haunted sites and other supernatural events. They applyscientific methodology and a professional approach in their field work, muchlike is done in MUFON. Two members of this team are also members of MUFON ofGeorgia, one being Olivia Newton of Lilburn, a SSD and FI for MUFONGA. Sheimplimented and continued this investigation due to the fact that others besidesherself were witness to the event. Case coordinator and WUFOD entry by SD TomSheets.
